archimate:ApplicationInterface.name: Tools SAP EPC* Interface P6-> SAP PS)
archimate:ApplicationInterface.documentation:
https://vestasprod.service-now.com/u_interface.do?sys_id=ad1c02dedb17c81086482dcb0b961975
Link to Release Note 1: https://vestas.sharepoint.com/sites/PRJ-ToolsManagementProject/Shared%20Documents/Super%20user%20community/Release%20Notes/20221031%20Release%20Note%20in%20T00%20Operational%20Planning.docx A few improvements introduced for Project Demand (YPP_PROJECT_DEMAND) / CON Balance Report (YPP_CON_BALANCE) - Planned Onsite/Offsite Dates from Primavera* in CON Balance Report - Analysis of missing containers due to master data in CON Balance Report - User specific layout input at selection - List each tool/container by forward follow by return
Link to Release Note 2: https://vestas.sharepoint.com/:w:/r/sites/PRJ-ToolsManagementProject/Shared%20Documents/Super%20user%20community/Release%20Notes/20230327%20Release%20Note%20in%20T00%20Operational%20Planning.docx?d=w3e70ef24df41497fad1756de876719df&csf=1&web=1&e=HjchY8 There are two parts to this release note - Missing container item in Project - Revise Error list in YPP_CON_BALANCE
